# Force Cookies - VS Code Extension

## Project Overview
This is a VS Code extension project called "Force Cookies" with the description "Clone wars era wisdom".

## Project Structure
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Extension Type**: Standard VS Code Extension
- **Package Manager**: npm
- **Bundler**: unbundled

## Development Workflow

### Testing the Extension
1. Press F5 to launch the Extension Development Host
2. Open Command Palette (Cmd+Shift+P)
3. Run "Hello World" command
4. A notification will appear

### Building
- `npm run compile` - Compile TypeScript
- `npm run watch` - Watch mode for development

### Project Setup Status
- [x] Project scaffolded successfully
- [x] Dependencies installed
- [x] TypeScript compiled without errors
- [x] Debug configuration ready
- [x] Documentation complete
